name: Kittens (1cloud)
description:
WASD to move

Mouse to look

Space to Jump

Shift to Run

E to Kittens wander/follow player

F10 to Quit

Your goal in this game is to guide kittens through the circle to get points. Circles activating when any kitty is going through and live for 4 seconds. Thats all. Game has 5-10 minutes of playtime. Kittens need time to get to you at the start.

I made this game just to have fun. I used Flock asset to controll kittes. But this thing  hasn't much controll, so kitties are just flying to you)  I hope you enjoy it!

Assets used in this game:

Quirky Series - Animals Mega Pack Vol.1/2

Magica Cloth

Quibli: Anime Shaders and Tools

Basic Motions

Toon Fantasy Nature

Rin New: Anime-Style Character

Character Movement Fundamentals

Flock Box DOTS
